message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. Given its value and quality, I believe it's worth $85 to you. Let me know if this works for you!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the quality of your product, I'm looking to spend no more than $80. Would you be willing to come down to that price?
I understand your position, Bob. To reach an agreement, I propose we set the price at $82 for your consideration.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price.  $82 is still a bit high for me. Would you consider $81?
Considering our previous discussions, I am willing to negotiate further. How about setting the price at $80.50 for your consideration?
